tool_description: Analyzes social media audience demographics, behavior patterns, and engagement preferences to provide insights for content optimization.

platform.description: Platform to analyze (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Account not accessible: Cannot access data for the specified account_id
Invalid analysis period: Period must be one of [7d, 30d, 90d, 1y]
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified time period
usage: Specify platform, account_id, and analysis_period to generate audience insights. Toggle analysis components with boolean flags as needed.

peak_activity_hours.description: Hours when audience is most active
